name: ReportLab
tag_list: pdf, web2print, online-marketing, software, open-source, enterprise-solutions, document-generation
overview:
ReportLab is a software company and respected member of the Open Source community whose core expertise is the development of bespoke document generation systems.

Built on top of ReportLab’s PDF tool-kit, these systems allow clients to generate customised documents on demand and serve them on the web or in print.

The content for these documents can be pulled from databases, XML feeds, web pages, or static PDFs, and are assembled on the fly according to templates.

Examples of ReportLab’s work include their hotel eBrochure system for Hilton Hotels, financial form platforms for Fidelity Investments, and publishing tool for University College London.

The driving idea behind ReportLab’s work is to provide customers with the same flexibility and customisability in dynamic document generation as they have come to expect from web development.
